quote: Fight for a better tomorrow. Always.
author: Pugnelius McPugpug

quote: You miss every shot you don't take
author: Wayne Grezky - Michael Scott

quote: Wait, you know he's three kids on top of each other right?
author: Bojack Horseman

quote: When I was upset, my friend told me I could be stuck in the bottom of a watering hole. It was a weird thing to say, but I knew he meant well
author: Myself
